name: search_by_centre_zip_and_radius
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool usa_zip_codes_inside_radius.
Tool description: Returns a list of all US ZIP codes that fall within a defined radius
API description: Perform a single radius search with a defined radius and then a location in the form of a ZIP code OR a latitude/longitude.

zip.description: The ZIP code around which to search for locations.

radius.description: The radius (in miles) within which to search for locations around the given ZIP code.
